paper_abstract: This paper is an investigation of shift invariant subspaces of L(2)(G), where G is a locally compact abelian group, or in general a local field, with a compact open subgroup. In this paper we state necessary and sufficient conditions for shifts of an element of L(2)(G) to be an orthonormal system or a Parseval frame. Also we show that each shift invariant subspace of L(2)(G) is a direct sum of principle shift invariant subspaces of L(2)(G) generated by Parseval frame generators.
paper_title: SHIFT INVARIANT SPACES FOR LOCAL FIELDS
